Question: This person was released by the Colts on March 7, 2012.
Hints: Still, trailing by 6 late in the game this person led the Colts on a 77-yard TD drive to take a 21–20 lead.
This person was also a unanimous first-team All-Pro selection.
This person finished the season with 4,040 passing yards, 31 touchdown passes, and a quarterback rating of 98.0.
